entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning then 60 percent chance of rain showers early in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 1000 metres near noon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023
